tests.title: Yeni mekan ekle:
tests.code:
const response = await request.post("/api/mekanlar").send({
  ad: "Starbucks",
  adres: "Centrum Garden",
  puan: 5,
  imkanlar: "çay,kahve,pasta",
  enlem: 37.83226584629666,
  boylam: 30.524732239878013,
  gunler1: "Pazartesi-Cuma",
  acilis1: "9:00",
  kapanis1: "23:00",
  kapali1: false,
  gunler2: "Cumartesi-Pazar",
  acilis2: "11:00",
  kapanis2: "17:00",
  kapali2: false,
});
expect(response.status).to.eql(201);
process.env.mekanid = response.body._id;

err.estack:
Error: ECONNREFUSED: Connection refused
    at Test.assert (node_modules\supertest\lib\test.js:156:20)
    at localAssert (node_modules\supertest\lib\test.js:120:14)
    at C:\Users\aleyn\OneDrive\Masaüstü\mekanbul\node_modules\supertest\lib\test.js:125:7
    at Test.Request.callback (node_modules\superagent\lib\node\index.js:866:3)
    at ClientRequest.<anonymous> (node_modules\superagent\lib\node\index.js:788:10)
    at ClientRequest.emit (node:events:513:28)
    at Socket.socketErrorListener (node:_http_client:481:9)

tests.title: Mekan Güncelle:
tests.code:
const response = await request
  .put(`/api/mekanlar/${process.env.mekanid}`)
  .send({
    ad: "Starbucks SDÜ",
    adres: "SDÜ Doğu Kampüsü",
    puan: 3,
    imkanlar: "çay,kahve,pasta,refresher",
    enlem: 37.8,
    boylam: 30.5,
    gunler1: "Pazartesi-Cuma",
    acilis1: "9:10",
    kapanis1: "23:10",
    kapali1: true,
    gunler2: "Cumartesi-Pazar",
    acilis2: "11:10",
    kapanis2: "17:10",
    kapali2: true,
  });
expect(response.status).to.eql(200);
